sentences.sContent: Early dehydration – no signs or symptoms.
sentences.sCn: 早期脱水——无迹象或无症状。

sentences.sContent: Those other drinks are full of sugar which actually causes dehydration.
sentences.sContent_eng: Those other drinks are full of sugar which actually causes dehydration.
sentences.sCn: 而实际上那些富含糖分的饮料容易造成脱水。

sentences.sContent: Concentration is distinct from dehydration, based on differences in final water content and product characteristics.
sentences.sContent_eng: Concentration is distinct from dehydration, based on differences in final water content and product characteristics.
sentences.sCn: 由于最终的水分含量和产品特性不同，浓缩与脱水是不同的。

words.tran: 使…脱水；使极其口渴；使丧失力量和兴趣等
